DOC.brief_summary: This non-intervention qualitative study use focus group assess feasibility acceptability propose intervention future study . The focus group discuss potential biobehavioral family self-management intervention design improve sleep person Alzheimer 's disease ( PAD ) caregiver ( CG ) .
DOC.brief_title: Development Therapeutic Intervention Sleep Alzheimer/Caregiver Dyads
DOC.detailed_description: Approximately 16 caregiver home-based PAD/CG dyad ( person Alzheimer 's disease/caregiver dyad ) recruit community . A series two audiotaped focus group conduct caregiver participant . The first focus group explore perspective constitutes feasible acceptable intervention improve sleep associate symptom . The second focus group consist follow confirmation finding first focus group . The intervention develop refine base upon focus group finding .
DOC.criteria: 1. screen positive PROMIS sleep disturbance associate symptom measure 2. caregiver within PAD/CG dyad 3. speak/understand English 4. agree audiotaped focus group participation 5. least 18 year age Exclusion : 1. negative PROMIS sleep disturbance associate symptom measure , 2. caregiver within PAD/CG dyad , 3. speak/understand English , 4. refuse take part audiotaping focus group , 5. least 18 year age .
